jProtocol.tls12.model.crypto

Class TlsRsaCipher

  • java.lang.Object
    • jProtocol.tls12.model.crypto.TlsRsaCipher

  • public class TlsRsaCipher
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TlsRsaCipher()
      Creates a new RSA cipher object and generates a new key pair (use on server side).
      TlsRsaCipher(byte[] encodedPublicKey)
      Creates a new RSA cipher object with just a public key (use on client side).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean checkSignature(byte[] data, byte[] signature)
      Checks a given signature for some data with the public key of this cipher.
      byte[] decrypt(byte[] encryptedData)
      RSA decrypts the data with the stored private key.
      byte[] encrypt(byte[] data)
      RSA encrypts the data with the stored public key.
      byte[] getEncodedPublicKey()
      Returns the stored public key in encoded format (probably X.509).
      byte[] signData(byte[] dataToSign)
      Computes a SHA1 RSA signature with the private key of this cipher.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • TlsRsaCipher

        public TlsRsaCipher()
        Creates a new RSA cipher object and generates a new key pair (use on server side).

      • TlsRsaCipher

        public TlsRsaCipher(byte[] encodedPublicKey)
        Creates a new RSA cipher object with just a public key (use on client side). Only encrypt should be called.
        Parameters:
        encodedPublicKey - the public RSA key

    • Method Detail

      • getEncodedPublicKey

        public byte[] getEncodedPublicKey()
        Returns the stored public key in encoded format (probably X.509).
        Returns:
        the encoded public key

      • encrypt

        public byte[] encrypt(byte[] data)
               throws TlsAsymmetricOperationException
        RSA encrypts the data with the stored public key.
        Parameters:
        data - the data
        Returns:
        the encrypted data
        Throws:
        TlsAsymmetricOperationException - if the RSA encryption fails

      • decrypt

        public byte[] decrypt(byte[] encryptedData)
               throws TlsAsymmetricOperationException
        RSA decrypts the data with the stored private key.
        Parameters:
        encryptedData - the encrypted data
        Returns:
        the decrypted data
        Throws:
        TlsAsymmetricOperationException - if the RSA decryption fails

      • signData

        public byte[] signData(byte[] dataToSign)
                throws TlsAsymmetricOperationException
        Computes a SHA1 RSA signature with the private key of this cipher.
        Parameters:
        dataToSign - the data to be signed
        Returns:
        the signature
        Throws:
        TlsAsymmetricOperationException - if an invalid key was provided or the signing process failed

      • checkSignature

        public boolean checkSignature(byte[] data,
                              byte[] signature)
                       throws TlsAsymmetricOperationException
        Checks a given signature for some data with the public key of this cipher.
        Parameters:
        data - the data which was signed
        signature - the computed signature
        Returns:
        true if the signature can be verified, false otherwise
        Throws:
        TlsAsymmetricOperationException - if an invalid key was provided or the verifying process failed
